title: Rise From Doomsday - Novel Updates
author: 太极阴阳鱼
description:
Resources were exhausted, a civil war broke out, and Earth was almost destroyed.
After order was re-established, there was still hostilities, and trouble quietly brewed below the surface...
A spaceship carrying a felon was shot down by pirates near Mars. The scapegoat Liu Wei'an was lucky and managed to survive.
After escaping, the little butterfly in the slave zone stirred its wings and changed the course of history.>
